application.model

Class ExperimentData

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.model.ExperimentData

  • public class ExperimentData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the experimental data on disk and stored properties that are edited through the view controller class MainViewController.

    The class allows Models, Properties and Observation data to be loaded individually from files on disk.

    A status string is used to report the success or failure of actions within the class. All data is private and accessed through getter and setter functions.

    Author:
    Colin Paterson
